skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: life mantra
des:
"My potential is limitless, and I choose where to spend my energy.” Sometimes all we need is a mantra to improve our lives, to help us remind what and why are we doing things we do. So to get yourself motivated everyday use this skill and get served with a unique mantra daily.

After once you have enabled this skill, to add this skill to a daily timer, follow these steps:
1 - Open your Alexa App.
2 - Go to more, select Routines.
3 - Select Create Routine.
4 - Enter routine name (say Daily Mantra).
5 - Select When this happens, select Schedule and add a time (say 7 AM).
6 - Select Add Action, and scroll down to skills.
6 - Choose Your Skills.
7 - Choose 'Life Mantra'. Done.

Take a deep breath, relax and just say: Alexa, open life mantra.
